-- | Allows programs written against MonadCGI to run with any hack handler.
--   
--   Allows programs written against MonadCGI to run with any hack handler.
@package hack-frontend-monadcgi
@version 0.0.3

module Hack.Frontend.MonadCGI
cgiToApp :: CGI CGIResult -> Application
cgiToAppGeneric :: Monad m => (m (Headers, CGIResult) -> IO (Headers, CGIResult)) -> CGIT m CGIResult -> Application
